[Hacisuleyman et al 2014 -- Firre KO mESC](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/download/?acc=GSE45157&format=file&file=GSE45157%5FmESC%5FKO%5Fvs%5FWT%5Fdiff%2Etxt%2Egz)
```{r}
# Hacisuleyman et al 2014 -- mESC Firre KO vs WT
dat <- read_tsv("data/GSE45157_mESC_KO_vs_WT_diff.txt")

ggplot(dat %>% filter(mESC_WT_mESC_KO_significant == "yes"), 
       aes(x = mESC_WT_mESC_KO_log2_fold_change)) + 
  geom_density() 

sig <- dat %>% filter(mESC_WT_mESC_KO_significant == "yes")

summary(sig$mESC_WT_mESC_KO_q_value)
summary(abs(sig$mESC_WT_mESC_KO_log2_fold_change))
```
